text.section: Any person who violates or enters a conspiracy to violate KRS 421.080 shall be fined not less than thirty dollars ($30) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500) or imprisoned not less than thirty (30) days nor more than six (6) months, or both.

In addition to the penalty prescribed in subsection (1) of this section, a practicing attorney who violates subsection (2) of KRS 421.080 may be disbarred, whether convicted under subsection (1) or not.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4866a-1 to 4866a-3.
